mapper.sql: SYS_DT, SYS_SEQ, TXN_CD, TXN_DESC, TXN_TP, TXN_ST, ERR_CD, ERR_MSG, CUPS_STLM_DT, HD_BUF, MSG_TP, PRC_CD, TXN_DT_TM, CUP_SSN, LCL_TM, LCL_DT, STLM_DT, ACQ_INS_CD, FWD_INS_CD, CUPS_RSP_CD, ADD_DATA, CRT_OPR, CRT_DT, UPD_OPR, UPD_DT, MISC, NET_MNG_CCD, FLD_RCS, RCV_INS_CD,HOST_ERR_CD, HOST_ERR_MSSG
mapper.select: SELECT STLM_DT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.STLM_DT FROM TBL_M_TXN T WHERE T.NET_MNG_CCD = '201' ORDER BY T.SYS_SEQ DESC) WHERE RN = 1
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_M_TXN (SYS_DT, SYS_SEQ, TXN_CD, TXN_DESC, TXN_TP, TXN_ST, ERR_CD, ERR_MSG, CUPS_STLM_DT, HD_BUF, MSG_TP, PRC_CD, TXN_DT_TM, CUP_SSN, LCL_TM, LCL_DT, STLM_DT, ACQ_INS_CD, FWD_INS_CD, CUPS_RSP_CD, ADD_DATA, CRT_OPR, CRT_DT, UPD_OPR, UPD_DT, MISC, NET_MNG_CCD, FLD_RCS, RCV_INS_CD, HOST_ERR_CD, HOST_ERR_MSSG) values (#{sysDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnTp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cupsStlmDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hdBuf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgTp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnDtTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cupSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lclTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lclDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stlmDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acqInsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fwdInsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cupsRspCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtOpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updOpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{misc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netMngCcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fldRcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcvInsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostErrCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{hostErrMssg,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update TBL_M_TXN
TXN_CD = #{txnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_DESC = #{txnDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_TP = #{txnTp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_ST = #{txnSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_CD = #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_MSG = #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUPS_STLM_DT = #{cupsStlmDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HD_BUF = #{hdBuf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSG_TP = #{msgTp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRC_CD = #{prcCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_DT_TM = #{txnDtTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUP_SSN = #{cupSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LCL_TM = #{lclTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LCL_DT = #{lclDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STLM_DT = #{stlmDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACQ_INS_CD = #{acqInsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FWD_INS_CD = #{fwdInsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUPS_RSP_CD = #{cupsRspCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_DATA = #{addData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRT_OPR = #{crtOpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRT_DT = #{crtDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPD_OPR = #{updOpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPD_DT = #{updDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MISC = #{misc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NET_MNG_CCD = #{netMngCcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLD_RCS = #{fldRcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RCV_INS_CD = #{rcvInsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOST_ERR_CD = #{hostErrCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOST_ERR_MSSG = #{hostErrMssg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SYS_DT = #{sysDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SYS_SEQ = #{sysSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TBL_M_TXN set TXN_CD = #{txnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXN_DESC = #{txnDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXN_TP = #{txnTp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXN_ST = #{txnSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_CD = #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_MSG = #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUPS_STLM_DT = #{cupsStlmDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HD_BUF = #{hdBuf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSG_TP = #{msgTp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRC_CD = #{prcCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXN_DT_TM = #{txnDtTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUP_SSN = #{cupSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LCL_TM = #{lclTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LCL_DT = #{lclDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STLM_DT = #{stlmDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACQ_INS_CD = #{acqInsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FWD_INS_CD = #{fwdInsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUPS_RSP_CD = #{cupsRspCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_DATA = #{addData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_OPR = #{crtOpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_DT = #{crtDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_OPR = #{updOpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_DT = #{updDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MISC = #{misc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NET_MNG_CCD = #{netMngCcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLD_RCS = #{fldRcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RCV_INS_CD = #{rcvInsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOST_ERR_CD = #{hostErrCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOST_ERR_MSSG = #{hostErrMssg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SYS_DT = #{sysDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SYS_SEQ = #{sysSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
